description:
You fucking men think you rule the world. CEOs, jocks, bros, thugs-- you all walk around with your dicks swinging, ready to take full advantage of everything the patriarchy grants you. Well, guess what you're not guaranteed? WOMEN. THEY ARE ALL LAUGHING AT YOU.
Now it's time to pay. Watch as leather clad Madeline takes out her anger on the first poor sucker who enters the mens room. She spies on his tiny ween and him as they take a piss, then she shoves his pathetic gelled head into the toilet and the games begin.
Madeline delivers a brutal flogging, locks his dick in twisted chastity, and fucks + cums all over his face, all the while threatening to pimp his sorry ass out. Finally, she reveals the newest addition to her body...a badass secret you'll just have to see for yourselves. If you're lucky.
title: Payback's a Bitch
